text: 9.1.2 Depth First Search e Uses stack. e To detect a cycle in a graph. e To find whether a graph is connected or not. e To find whether given graph is bipartite or not. e To find number of connected components in the graph. e To find bridges in the graph. e To find articulation points in the graph. e To find topological sort of a graph. e To find biconnected components. e To find strongly connected components.
